tha-ap23:3.3: Pavattaṃva supātāhaṃ → pavattapaṇḍupattāni (bj); pavattañca supātāhaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed); pavattapaṇḍupattāhaṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap23:8.2: yadā puttaṃ → sadā yuttaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1); yadā yuttaṃ (sya1ed); dayā yuttaṃ (sya2ed)
tha-ap23:11.3: Saddhādhuraṃ vahisi → saddhādhuraṃ jahasi (bj); sīghaṃ dhuraṃ vahisi (sya1ed, sya2ed); saddhādhuraṃ pāhisi (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap23:18.4: jhāyissasi → jhāpessasi (bj); yāyissati (sya1ed, sya2ed); neva yāyasi (pts-vp-pli1)
